q: President Bush at a National Security Council meeting Feb. 3, 2003, in which Colin Powell sketched out the presentation he was to make at the U.N. two days later. Rumsfeld quotes himself as telling the meeting, We should hit Khurmal during the speech, given that Colin Powell will talk about it. Khurmal is the name of a village near the site. Celebrities and well-knowns have dined at Al Tiramisu. George Clooney-who is fun and real and also brought mom and dad-has probably come about 20 times, says the chef/owner. Others include and Catherine Zeta-Jones , Demi Moore Wolf Blitzer , and Pele. Magic Johnson and David Letterman also ordered carry out. interview excerpt from
Colin Powell , President Bush 's first secretary of state,`` did not, in my view, do a good job of managing the people under him,'' Donald Rumsfeld said.
There was a lot of leaking out of the State Department, and the president knew it, he said.`` And it was unhelpful. And most of it ended up making the State Department look good. We didn't do that in the Pentagon. I insisted we not do it.''

fundraisers and other political insiders surveyed by the nonpartisan National Journal, Mitch Daniels recently was chosen as the second-most-likely to get the GOP nomination, after Mitt Romney . Mike Pence didn't make the top 10. Mike Pence displays the kind of optimism, moral values and gutsy leadership we need in a president-- and a presidential nominee, says the draft-Pence website, theconservativechampion.org.`` He bridges the gap between the establishment and the grassroots,'' wrote influential conservative blogger Erick Erickson on RedState.com. '' Eric Schmidt 's explanation of his role change is seen by many as a nice way of acknowledging what former Google designer Douglas Bowman said when he famously left the Internet giant in 2009: Yes, it's true that a team at Google couldn't decide between two blues, so they're testing 41 shades between each blue to see which one performs better. I had a recent debate over whether a border should be 3, 4 or 5 pixels wide, and was asked to prove my case. I can't operate in an environment like that. I've grown tired of debating such minuscule design decisions. There are more exciting design problems in this world to tackle. What else does the change mean? Check out some deeper concerns here.
